properties.areaDesc: S of Cape Lookout NC to Surf City NC out to 20 nm; S of Ocracoke Inlet NC to Cape Lookout NC out to 20 nm
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued February 5 at 3:19PM EST until February 7 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 kt with gusts up to 45 kt and
seas 13 to 18 ft expected.

* WHERE...The coastal waters from Cape Lookout to Surf City.

* WHEN...From 5 PM Thursday to 10 PM EST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THURSDAY TO 10 PM EST FRIDAY
